lead_paragraph: WARREN--Vivien G.,died peacefully on April 14, 2016 at the age of 96. Beloved mother of David and Phyllis, and beloved grandmother of Annie O'Connell and Ellie O'Connell. She is also survived by her daughter-in-law, Noreen Warren, and her son-in-law, James O'Connell, Jr. She will be mourned and deeply missed by her family and many friends. Funeral observances will be private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WARREN, VIVIEN G.
